WorkItem.ClosedComment: We do not have multi-language support at this time.
WorkItem.Description:
rawr export in game like 
!!!begin
        <Name>使徒歸來</Name>
        <Realm>暗影之月</Realm>
        <Region>TW</Region>
        <Race>德萊尼</Race>
        <Class>Shaman</Class>
        <Level>85</Level>
        <CurrentModel>Enhance</CurrentModel>
        <Bags>
!!end
these xml include chinese word. 
but rawr is not know the race in chinese.
the rawr report this error 
There is an error in XML document (9, 10).
Instance validation error: '德萊尼' is not a valid value for CharacterRace..
WorkItem.Summary: [Addon] Has some problem with wow TW
